name: Platformer Prototype (mario610)
description:
I don't know if I can make it so you don't have to install it or not since it's a very old gamemaker project before gamemaker 2 came out, but here it is, just thought I'd put it out there for a portfolio potentially.

Controls are simple, arrow keys to move, shift to run, space to jump (could be some other controls I forgot).

Your max and current jumps are displayed as a number top left.
